## Decision Owner

@jeff

---

**Decision Process:**
1. Requestor proposes process change with rationale
2. Affected team members provide input (48 hours)
3. Leadership discusses impact and alternatives
4. Jeff decides (or brings to Traffic Control if team-wide)
5. Implementation plan executed
6. Review scheduled for future date
7. Charter updated if needed
